context.content: "How to Train Your Dragon" is about a young Viking named Hiccup who aspires to hunt dragons, but ends up befriending a dragon instead. The movie follows their journey as they work together to change the way their village views dragons. The main characters are Hiccup, a clever and inventive young Viking, and Toothless, a rare Night Fury dragon. The movie is filled with thrilling dragon flights and adventurous quests.

The movie's stunning animation and exhilarating action sequences will definitely keep you on the edge of your seat!
